<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">been issued under the
Securities Act and no proceedings for such purpose have been instituted or are
pending or are contemplated by the Commission against the Company.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(h)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The Registration Statement and the
Prospectus (except for the Form T-1 and the financial statements and supporting
schedules and other financial data included or incorporated therein, or omitted
therefrom, as to which we express no opinion) comply as to form in all material
respects with the requirements of the Securities Act and the applicable rules
and regulations thereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Each of the Exchange Act Reports (as
defined in Schedule 1 hereto) (except for the financial statements and
supporting schedules included therein and other financial data included or
incorporated therein, or omitted therefrom, as to which we express no opinion),
at the time it was filed with the Commission, complied as to form in all
material respects with the requirements of the Exchange Act and the applicable
rules and regulations thereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(j)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; No approval or consent of, or filing
with any Federal governmental agency or the Department of Assessments and
Taxation of the State of Maryland or the Secretary of State of the State of New
York is required to be obtained or made by the Company under Applicable Federal
Law, Maryland Corporation Law, or Applicable State Law in connection with the
execution, delivery and performance as of the date hereof by the Company of the
Agreements.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(k)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The Indenture has been qualified
under the Trust Indenture Act.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(l)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The Company is not, and immediately
following the issuance and sale of the Notes and the application of the
proceeds thereof as described in the Prospectus will not be, an &#147;investment
company,&#148; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">within the meaning of</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> the Investment Company Act.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; In addition, such counsel shall also
state (which statement may be in a separate letter in customary form) that </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">no facts have
come to its attention that cause it to believe that:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; (i) the
Registration Statement, as of the date of the Underwriting Agreement, contained
an untrue statement of a material fact or omitted to state a material fact
required to be stated therein or necessary to make the statements therein not
misleading,</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; (ii) the
Prospectus, as of its date or as of the date hereof, contained or contains an
untrue statement of a material fact or omitted or omits to state a material
fact necessary in order to make the statements therein, in the light of the
circumstances under which they were made, not misleading,</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; (iii) the
Pricing Disclosure Package, as of </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">4:20 p.m. (New York City time) on December 4, 2007</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;"> (which you
have informed us is a time prior to the time of the first sale of the Notes by
any Underwriter)</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">,
when considered together with the information contained in Schedule B hereto (</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">which you have
informed us&nbsp;was available&nbsp;at or prior to&nbsp;such time)</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">, </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">contained an untrue
statement of a material fact or omitted to state a material fact necessary in
order to make the statements therein, in the light of the circumstances under
which they were made, not misleading.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit B-2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='Exhibit B-2',FILE='C:\JMS\tmyhrea\07-30945-1\task2563306\30945-1-hn.htm',USER='tmyhrea',CD='Dec  7 10:59 2007' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in 12.0pt;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">In rendering such opinion, such counsel may rely<b>,</b> as to matters of fact (but not as to legal conclusions),
to the extent they deem proper, on certificates of responsible officers of the
Company and public officials.&#160; Such
opinion shall not state that it is to be governed or qualified by, or that it
is otherwise subject to, any treatise, written policy or other document
relating to legal opinions, including, without limitation, the Legal Opinion
Accord of the ABA Section of Business Law (1991).</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit B-3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div>

<p align="right" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">Exhibit 4.1</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">McCORMICK&nbsp;&amp; COMPANY, INCORPORATED,</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">as Issuer,</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THE BANK OF NEW YORK,</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">as Trustee</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">INDENTURE</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Dated as of December&nbsp;7, 2007</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><hr size="1" width="25%" noshade color="black" align="left"></div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Note: This reconciliation and tie shall not, for any purpose, be deemed
to be a part of the Indenture.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;3.10
  Computation of Interest.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;3.11 Global
  Securities.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">16</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;3.12 CUSIP Numbers.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE IV SATISFACTION AND DISCHARGE</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">17</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;4.1 Satisfaction and
  Discharge of Securities of any Series.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">17</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">

  Trust Money.</font></p>

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">

  Discharge of Indenture.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;4.4
  Reinstatement.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">19</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">

  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">

  Default.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

 </tr>

  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">

  Maturity; Rescission and Annulment.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

 </tr>

  Indebtedness and Suits for Enforcement by Trustee.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

  Proofs of Claim.</font></p>

  Enforce Claims Without Possession of Securities.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">

  Money Collected.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">22</font></p>

 </tr>

  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">

  Suits.</font></p>

  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

 </tr>

  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">

  Right of Holders to Receive Principal, Premium and Interest.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">

  Rights and Remedies.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

  Remedies Cumulative.</font></p>

  Omission Not Waiver.</font></p>

  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

  Holders.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

  Defaults.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

  Costs.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

  </td>

  </td>

 <tr>

  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">25</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.1 Certain Duties
  and Responsibilities.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">25</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.2 Notice of
  Defaults.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">26</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.3 Certain Rights
  of Trustee.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">26</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.4 Not Responsible
  for Recitals or Issuance of Securities.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">27</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.5 May Hold
  Securities.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">27</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.6 Money Held in
  Trust.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">27</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.7 Compensation and
  Reimbursement.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">27</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.8 Qualification of
  Trustee; Conflicting Interests.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">28</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.9 Corporate
  Trustee Required; Eligibility.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">28</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.10 Resignation and
  Removal; Appointment of Successor.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">29</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.11 Acceptance of
  Appointment by Successor.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">30</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.12 Merger,
  Conversion, Consolidation or Succession to Business.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">30</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.13 Preferential
  Collection of Claims Against Company.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">31</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;6.14 Appointment of
  Authenticating Agent.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">31</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;page-break-after:auto;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE VII HOLDERS&#146; LISTS AND REPORTS BY TRUSTEE AND
  COMPANY</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">32</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;7.1 Company to
  Furnish Trustee Names and Addresses of Holders.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">32</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;7.2 Preservation of
  Information; Communications to Holders.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">32</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;7.3 Reports by
  Trustee.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">33</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;7.4 Reports by
  Company.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">33</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE VIII CONSOLIDATION, MERGER, CONVEYANCE, TRANSFER OR
  LEASE</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;8.1 Company May
  Consolidate, etc., Only on Certain Terms.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">34</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;8.2 Successor
  Corporation Substituted.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">35</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;8.3 Officers&#146;
  Certificate and Opinion of Counsel.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">35</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE IX SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURES</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">35</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;9.1 Supplemental
  Indentures Without Consent of Holders.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">35</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;9.2 Supplemental
  Indentures with Consent of Holders.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

  Supplemental Indentures.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">37</font></p>

  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">

  Trust Indenture Act.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;9.6 Reference in
  Securities to Supplemental Indentures.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">37</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;page-break-after:auto;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE X COVENANTS</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;10.1 Payment of
  Principal, Premium and Interest.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">37</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;10.2 Maintenance of
  Office or Agency.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

  Security Payments to be Held in Trust.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

 </tr>

  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">

  Properties.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">

 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">

  Taxes and Other Claims.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">39</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;10.7 Limitations on
  Liens.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">39</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;10.8 Limitations on
  Sale and Leaseback.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">40</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;10.9 Statements by
  Officers as to Compliance and Default.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">41</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;10.10 Waiver of
  Certain Covenants.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">41</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;10.11 Defeasance of
  Certain Obligations.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">41</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;page-break-after:auto;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE XI REDEMPTION OF SECURITIES</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">42</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;11.1 Applicability
  of Article.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">42</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;11.2 Election to Redeem;
  Notice to Trustee.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">42</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;11.3 Selection by
  Trustee of Securities to be Redeemed.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">42</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;11.4 Notice of
  Redemption.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">43</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;11.5 Deposit of
  Redemption Price.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">43</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;11.6 Securities
  Payable on Redemption Date.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">44</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="90%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:90.66%;">
  <p style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 30.0pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-10.0pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;11.7 Securities
  Redeemed in Part.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="9%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:9.34%;">
  <p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">44</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:auto;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:12.0pt;">ii</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="3" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

  </td>
  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:15.0%;">

  Applicability of Article.</font></p>
  </td>

  <p align="right" style="margin:0in .5in .0001pt 0in;text-align:right;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">44</font></p>

  Satisfaction of Sinking Fund Payments with Securities.</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="15%" valign="top" style="padding:0in .7pt 0in .7pt;width:15.0%;">

  </td>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(1)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Note: This table of
contents shall not, for any purpose, be deemed to be a part of this Indenture.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">iii</font></p>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='iii',FILE='C:\JMS\khester\07-30945-1\task2563755\30945-1-kf.htm',USER='khester',CD='Dec  7 15:50 2007' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; INDENTURE,
dated as of Decemb</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">er&nbsp;7,
20</font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">07, between McCORMICK&nbsp;&amp; COMPANY, INCORPORATED, a Maryland
corporation (the &#147;Company&#148;), and THE BANK OF NEW YORK, a New York banking
corporation, as trustee (the &#147;Trustee&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">RECITALS OF
THE COMPANY</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; The Company has duly
authorized the execution and delivery of this Indenture to provide for the
issuance from time to time of its unsecured debentures, notes or other
evidences of indebtedness (herein called the &#147;Securities&#148;), to be issued in one
or more series as in this Indenture provided.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; All things
necessary have been done to make this Indenture a valid agreement of the
Company, in accordance with its terms.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; NOW,
THEREFORE, THIS INDENTURE WITNESSETH:</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; For and in
consideration of the premises and the purchase of the Securities by the Holders
thereof, it is mutually covenanted and agreed, for the equal and proportionate
benefit of all Holders of the Securities, as follows:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:12.0pt 0in;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-transform:uppercase;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">ARTICLE I<br>
<br>
DEFINITIONS AND OTHER PROVISIONS OF GENERAL APPLICATION</font></b></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:12.0pt 0in;page-break-after:avoid;text-autospace:none;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Section&nbsp;1.1&#160;
Definitions.</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; For all purposes
of this Indenture, except as otherwise expressly provided or unless the context
otherwise requires:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; (a)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; the terms defined in this Article
have the meanings assigned to them in this Article, and include the plural as
well as the singular;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; (b)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all other terms used herein which are
defined in the Trust Indenture Act, either directly or by reference therein,
have the meanings assigned to them therein;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; (c)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; all accounting terms not otherwise
defined herein have the meanings assigned to them in accordance with generally
accepted accounting principles, and, except as otherwise herein expressly
provided, the term &#147;generally accepted accounting principles&#148; with respect to
any computation required or permitted hereunder shall mean such accounting principles
as are generally accepted at the date of this Indenture; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; (d)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; the words &#147;herein,&#148; &#147;hereof&#148; and &#147;hereunder&#148;
and other words of similar import refer to this Indenture as a whole and not to
any particular Article, Section or other subdivision.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Act&#148;, when used
with respect to any Holder, has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;1.4.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Affiliate&#148; of any
specified Person means any other Person directly or indirectly controlling or
controlled by or under direct or indirect common control with such specified
Person. For the purposes of this definition, &#147;control&#148; when used with respect
to any specified Person means the power to direct the management and policies
of such Person, directly or indirectly, whether through the ownership of voting
securities, by contract or otherwise; and the terms &#147;controlling&#148; and &#147;controlled&#148;
have meanings correlative to the foregoing.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Attributable Debt&#148;
with respect to any sale leaseback transaction restricted by Section&nbsp;10.8
means the lesser of (i)&nbsp;the total net amount of rent required to be paid
during the remaining base term of the related lease or until the earliest date
on which the lessee may terminate such lease upon payment of a penalty or a
lump-sum termination payment (in which case the total net rent shall include
such penalty or termination payment), discounted</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">1</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='1',FILE='C:\JMS\jmerica\07-30945-1\task2562911\30945-1-kh.htm',USER='jmerica',CD='Dec  7 05:25 2007' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">at the weighted average interest rate borne by the Outstanding
Securities, compounded semi-annually, or (ii)&nbsp;the sale price of the
property so leased multiplied by a fraction, the numerator of which is the
remaining base term of the related lease and the denominator of which is the
base term of such lease.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Authenticating
Agent&#148; means any Person authorized by the Trustee to act on behalf of the Trustee
to authenticate Securities.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Beneficial Owner&#148;
means, with respect to Global Securities, the Person who is the beneficial
owner of such Securities as reflected on the books of the Depositary for such
Securities or on the books of a Person maintaining an account with such
Depositary (directly or as an indirect participant, in accordance with the
rules of such Depositary).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Board of
Directors&#148; means either the board of directors of the Company, as the case may
be, or any duly authorized committee of that board.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Board Resolution&#148;
means a copy of a resolution certified by the Secretary or an Assistant
Secretary of the Company to have been duly adopted by the Board of Directors
and to be in full force and effect on the date of such certification, and
delivered to the Trustee.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Business Day&#148;,
when used with respect to any Place of Payment, means each Monday, Tuesday,
Wednesday, Thursday and Friday which is not a day on which banking institutions
in that Place of Payment are authorized or obligated by law, regulation or
executive order to close.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Certificate of a
Firm of Independent Public Accountants&#148; means a certificate signed by any firm
of independent public accountants of recognized standing selected by the
Company. The term &#147;independent&#148; when used with respect to any specified firm of
public accountants means such a firm which (1)&nbsp;is in fact independent,
(2)&nbsp;does not have any direct financial interest or any material indirect
financial interest in the Company or in any other obligor upon the Securities
of any series or in any affiliate of the Company or of such other obligor, and
(3)&nbsp;is not connected with the Company or such other obligor or any
affiliate of the Company or of such other obligor, as an officer, employee,
promoter, underwriter, trustee, partner, director or Person performing similar
functions, but such firm may be the regular auditors employed by the Company.
Whenever it is herein provided that any Certificate of a Firm of Independent
Public Accountants shall be furnished to the Trustee for Securities of any
series, such Certificate shall state that the signer has read this definition
and that the signer is independent within the meaning hereof.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Commission&#148; means
the Securities and Exchange Commission, as from time to time constituted,
created under the Exchange Act, or, if at any time after the execution of this
instrument such Commission is not existing and performing the duties now
assigned to it under the Trust Indenture Act, then the body performing such
duties at such time.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Company&#148; means
the Person named as the &#147;Company&#148; in the first paragraph of this instrument,
until a successor Person shall have become such pursuant to the applicable
provisions of this Indenture, and thereafter &#147;Company&#148; shall mean such
successor Person.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Company Request&#148;
or &#147;Company Order&#148; means a written request or order signed in the name of the
Company by any one of its Chairman of the Board, its President or a Vice
President, and by any one of its Treasurer, an Assistant Treasurer, its
Secretary or an Assistant Secretary, and delivered to the Trustee.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Consolidated Net
Tangible Assets&#148; means the total assets of the Company and its consolidated
subsidiaries, including the investment in (at equity) and the net amount of
advances to and accounts receivable from corporations which are not
consolidated subsidiaries less the following:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">current
liabilities of the Company and its consolidated subsidiaries, including an
amount equal to indebtedness required to be redeemed by reason of any sinking
fund payment due in 12&nbsp;months or less from the date as of which current
liabilities are to be determined;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\JMS\jmerica\07-30945-1\task2562911\30945-1-kh.htm',USER='jmerica',CD='Dec  7 05:25 2007' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">all other
liabilities of the Company and its consolidated subsidiaries other than Funded
Debt, deferred income taxes and liabilities for employee post-retirement health
plans other than pensions recognized in accordance with Statement of Financial
Accounting Standards No.&nbsp;106;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iii)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">all
depreciation and valuation reserves and all other reserves (except for reserves
for contingencies which have not been allocated to any particular purpose) of
the Company and its consolidated subsidiaries;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(iv)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">the book amount
of all segregated intangible assets of the Company and its consolidated
subsidiaries, including, but without limitation, such items as goodwill,
trademarks, trade names, patents and unamortized debt discount and expense less
unamortized debt premium; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt .5in;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.0in;text-autospace:none;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(v)</font><font size="1" style="font-size:3.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" style="font-size:10.0pt;">appropriate
adjustments on account of minority interests of other Persons holding stock in
subsidiaries.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Consolidated Net
Tangible Assets shall be determined on a consolidated basis in accordance with
generally accepted accounting principles and as provided herein.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="line-height:normal;margin:0in 0in 6.0pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Corporate Trust Office&#148; means
the office of the Trustee at which at any particular time its corporate trust
business shall be principally administered, which office at the date of
execution of this Indenture is located at 101 Barclay Street, Floor 8 West, New
York, New York 10286, Attention:&#160;
Corporate Trust Administration, or such other address as the Trustee may
designate from time to time by notice to the Holders and the Company, or the
principal corporate trust office of any successor Trustee (or such other
address as such successor Trustee may designate from time to time by notice to
the Holders and the Company).</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;corporation&#148;
includes corporations, associations, companies and business trusts.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Defaulted
Interest&#148; has the meaning specified in Section&nbsp;3.7.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Depositary&#148; means
a clearing agency registered as such under the Exchange Act, as amended, or any
successor thereto, which shall in either case be designated by the Company
pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.1 until a successor Depositary shall have become
such pursuant to the applicable provisions of this Indenture, and thereafter &#147;Depositary&#148;
shall mean or include each Person who is then a Depositary hereunder, and if at
any time there is more than one such Person, &#147;Depositary&#148; as used with respect
to the Securities of any series shall mean the Depositary with respect to the
Securities of that series.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Discounted
Security&#148; means any Security which provides for an amount (excluding any
amounts attributable to accrued but unpaid interest thereon) less than the
principal amount thereof to be due and payable upon a declaration of acceleration
of the Maturity thereof pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.2.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Dollars&#148; and the
sign &#147;$&#148; mean the currency of the United States of America as at the time of
payment is legal tender for the payment of public and private debts.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Event of Default&#148;
has the meaning specified in Article&nbsp;V.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Exchange Act&#148;
means the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Exempted
Indebtedness&#148; means as of any particular time the sum of (i)&nbsp;all then
outstanding indebtedness for borrowed money of the Company and Restricted
Subsidiaries incurred after the date hereof and secured by any mortgage,
security interest, pledge or lien other than those permitted by
paragraph&nbsp;(a) of Section&nbsp;10.7, and (ii)&nbsp;all Attributable Debt
with respect to Sale and Leaseback Transactions entered into by the Company and
Restricted Subsidiaries after the date hereof other than those permitted by
paragraph&nbsp;(a) of Section&nbsp;10.8.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Funded Debt&#148;
means any indebtedness of the Company or a Restricted Subsidiary for borrowed
money having a maturity of more than 12&nbsp;months from the date such
indebtedness was incurred or having a maturity of less</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='3',FILE='C:\JMS\jmerica\07-30945-1\task2562911\30945-1-kh.htm',USER='jmerica',CD='Dec  7 05:25 2007' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">than 12&nbsp;months but by its terms being renewable or extendable
beyond 12&nbsp;months from the date such indebtedness was incurred at the
option of the obligor.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Global Security&#148;
means a Security evidencing all or part of a series of Securities which is
executed by the Company and authenticated and delivered to the Depositary or
pursuant to the Depositary&#146;s instructions, all in accordance with this
Indenture and pursuant to a Company Order, which shall be registered in the
name of the Depositary or its nominee and which shall represent the amount of
uncertificated securities as specified therein.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; &#147;Government
Obligations&#148; means securities that are (i)&nbsp;direct obligations of the
government which issued the currency in which the Securities of a particular
series are payable or (ii)&nbsp;obligations of a Person controlled or
supervised by and acting as an agency or instrumentality of the government that
issued the currency in which the Securities of such series are payable, the
payment of which is unconditionally guaranteed by such government, which, in
either case, are full faith and credit obligations of such government payable in
